resources.string: Override Active911 Split Alert Settings
Recommended Active911 settings will be overridden
Recommended Active911 settings will be used
Check for Split Direct Pages
Direct pages will be checked for split alert messages
Direct pages will be not checked for split alert messages
Split message timeout
Multi-message page timeout\nCur value: %%s
Maximum time in seconds to wait for rest of multi-message CAD pages
Split message min count
Minimum expected message count\nCur value: %%s
Reverse split msg order
Split CAD page messages will be expected in last to first order
Split CAD page messages will be expected in first to last order
Mixed split msg order
Split CAD page messages may not be in consistent order
Split CAD page messages will always be in consistent order
Insert Blanks in Split msgs
Blanks will be inserted between split page texts
Blanks will not be inserted between split page texts
